text: Gruyère cheese is a hard yellow cheese made from cow's milk, named after the town of Gruyères Gruyère or Gruyere may also refer to: * Gruyère (district), a district of the canton of Fribourg in Switzerland, * Gruyères, a Swiss town in the Gruyère district, known for the cheese named after it * Lake of Gruyère, a lake in the canton of Fribourg in Switzerland * Gruyères, Ardennes, a commune in France * Gruyere, Victoria, a town in the Yarra Valley wine region east of Melbourne, Australia
title: Gruyère
